name: niqlow
tagline: design, solve and estimate discrete dynamic programs.
body:
### `niqlow` is ...
A platform to _design_, _solve_ and _estimate_ discrete dynamic programs.

`niqlow` has 3 components that work together or separately:
* `DDP`: Derived Dynamic Programs
* `FiveO`: Object-Oriented Objective Optimization in Ox.
* `CFMPI`: An interface to the MPI library.

### Obtaining through git

```
$ cd ferrall/niqlow
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```


### Authors and Contributors
* `niqlow` was created by Christopher Ferrall (@ferrall).  
* `niqlow` is written in [Ox] (http://www.doornik.com/products.html#Ox) by Jurgen Doornik.
* Documentation is produced using [OxDoc](https://github.com/yozw/oxdoc) by Yori Zwols (@yozw)
